attributes.action: Stop the BBC charging compulsory taxes and move to subscription service
attributes.background: The general public are being forced to pay for services they don’t use enforced with court fines. It is time the BBC changed to a subscription service in line with other broadcasting companies and stop criminalization for not paying for unused services.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

End the TV licence and sell the BBC: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614239

Abolish the requirement for BBC non-viewers to have a TV licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621917
